reviews.review_msg: Amazing prof. I usually have a hard time committing to 8:30 a.m classes especially if its history but Dale makes the class seem so interesting and makes you not want to miss class.

Dale is an incredible lecturer. His voice fills the room so you cant help but be riveted. He is passionate about what he teaches it and treats all of his students like adults and equals. He really gets the class into the subject, and the 3 hour lectures arent long enough. His class was my favourite class and I would recommend it to everyone

As someone who learns best from lectures, I really enjoyed his class.  He has an epic voice that makes you intent on hearing what he has to say next.  His on screen notes aren't incredibly detailed so you have to pay attention to the lecture.
